name: UpgradeServiceHelper
description: Will help customers upgrade their service.

plainTextMessage.value: Okay, canceled. You can always head back here and I can help upgrade your service anytime. For additional help enter 'more options'. Otherwise have a great day!
Good choice! Your new monthly bill will be 59.99. I can make the change happen right now. All I need is for you to approve by entering 'yes'. To cancel enter 'no'.
Okay your service has been upgraded, hurray! You will receive an email confirmation of the changes and prorated charges. Thank you.
